entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -20.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow at times late this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
